SongLyrics.JpnStr: 靴紐[くつひも]が解[ほど]けてる 木漏[こも]れ日[び]は足[あし]を舐[な]む
SongLyrics.EngStr: My shoelaces are undone, the sunbeams filter through the trees

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 息[いき]を吸[す]う音[おと]だけ聞[き]こえてる
SongLyrics.EngStr: The sound of my breath is the only thing that I hear

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 貴方[あなた]は今[いま]立[た]ち上[あ]がる 古[ふる]びた椅子[いす]の上[うえ]から
SongLyrics.EngStr: You stand up from that creaky old chair

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 柔[やわ]らかい麻[あさ]の匂[にお]いがする
SongLyrics.EngStr: The gentle smell of hemp tickles my nose

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 遥[はる]か遠[とお]くへ まだ遠[とお]くへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Into the horizon, and the great beyond

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]らは身体[からだ]も脱[ぬ]ぎ去[さ]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: We take off and leave our bodies behind

SongLyrics.JpnStr: まだ遠[とお]くへ 雲[くも]も越[こ]えてまだ向[む]こうへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even further, to a place higher than the clouds

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 風[かぜ]に乗[の]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: We ride the wind to places that defy even our imagination

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]の想像力[そうぞうりょく]という重力[じゅうりょく]の向[む]こうへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Flying ever

SongLyrics.JpnStr: まだ遠[とお]くへ まだ遠[とお]くへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Further away

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 海[うみ]の方[ほう]へ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Ever towards the sea

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 靴紐[くつひも]が解[ほど]けてる 蛇[へび]みたいに跳[は]ね遊[あそ]ぶ
SongLyrics.EngStr: My shoelaces are undone, like snakes they bound around and play

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 貴方[あなた]の靴[くつ]が気[き]になる
SongLyrics.EngStr: I wonder if your shoes are undone too

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]らは今[いま]歩[ある]き出[だ]す 潮風[しおかぜ]は肌[はだ]を舐[な]む
SongLyrics.EngStr: The sea breeze licks our skin, as we walk along

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 手[て]を引[ひ]かれるままの道[みち]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The path your hands lead me down

SongLyrics.JpnStr: さぁまだ遠[とお]くへ まだ遠[とお]くへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Into the horizon, and the great beyond

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]らはただの風[かぜ]になって
SongLyrics.EngStr: We become the wind and fly

SongLyrics.JpnStr: まだ遠[とお]くへ 雲[くも]も越[こ]えてまだ向[む]こうへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even further, to a place higher than the clouds

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 風[かぜ]に乗[の]って 僕[ぼく]ら想像力[そうぞうりょく]という縛[しば]りを抜[ぬ]け出[だ]して
SongLyrics.EngStr: We ride the wind, slipping from the shackles of our imagination

SongLyrics.JpnStr: まだ遠[とお]くへ まだ遠[とお]くへ 海[うみ]の方[ほう]へ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Flying ever further away, ever towards the sea

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 靴紐[くつひも]が解[ほど]けてる 僕[ぼく]はついにしゃがみ込[こ]む
SongLyrics.EngStr: My shoelaces are undone, and I finally crouch down to tie them up

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 鳥[とり]の鳴[な]く声[こえ]だけ聞[き]こえてる
SongLyrics.EngStr: The chirping of birds is the only thing that I hear

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 肩[かた]をそっと叩[たた]かれてようやく僕[ぼく]は気[き]が付[つ]く
SongLyrics.EngStr: You pat my shoulder

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 海[うみ]がもう目[め]の先[さき]にある
SongLyrics.EngStr: And as I lift my head the sea comes into view

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あぁまだ遠[とお]くへ まだ遠[とお]くへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Into the horizon, and the great beyond

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]らは心[こころ]だけになって
SongLyrics.EngStr: We leave our bodies and become spirits

SongLyrics.JpnStr: まだ遠[とお]くへ 海[うみ]も越[こ]えてまだ向[む]こうへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even further, to a place higher than the clouds

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 風[かぜ]に乗[の]って 僕[ぼく]の想像力[そうぞうりょく]という重力[じゅうりょく]の向[む]こうへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: We ride the wind to places that defy even our imagination

SongLyrics.JpnStr: まだ遠[とお]くへ まだ遠[とお]くへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Flying ever further away

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 海[うみ]の方[ほう]へ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Ever toward the sea

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]らは今[いま]靴[くつ]を脱[ぬ]ぐ さざなみは足[あし]を舐[な]む
SongLyrics.EngStr: We take off our shoes, and the ripples tickle our feet

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 貴方[あなた]の眼[め]は遠[とお]くを見[み]る
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your eyes look into the distance

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ライオンが戯[たわむ]れるアフリカの砂浜[すなはま]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: On this African beach, we lions play

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 海[うみ]のずっと向[む]こうにある
SongLyrics.EngStr: The sea reaching out into the great beyond

ListVocab: しゃがみ込む-しゃがみこむ
想像力-そうぞうりょく
